attributes.action: take passports off all peadophiles and sex offenders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
to stop them reoffending abroad we believe that its your job to help protect our children from these monsters you take passports off footie hooligans so why not peadophiles they dont deserve human rights they gave them up when they touched a child inapropiately and with them still having there passports and being allowed to have one then they can simply go and reoffend abroad it seems you have stricter laws on fathers who dont pay for there kids ie naming and shaming on the csa website why are peadophiles above this law why is there identity protected?
we need to speak for all children its our jobs as parents

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
